name: Sunder
description: Find the cure your tribe needs to survive a deadly disease by overcoming a series of obstacles in a post-Sundering world as you descend further into an ancient ruin. This is a short text-based game, written by Itelinee and coded by myself, MaeDay. Rooms are picked randomly, allowing a level of replayability. This is the first game either of us have worked on, so any feedback is appreciated.
